globalProperty.value: select distinct concat( ifnull(pn.given_name,'') ,' ', pn.family_name ) as name, pi.identifier as identifier, concat("",p.uuid) as uuid, concat("",v.uuid) as activeVisitUuid, IF(va.value_reference = "Admitted", "true", "false") as hasBeenAdmitted from visit v join person_name pn on v.patient_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 join patient_identifier pi on v.patient_id = pi.patient_id join patient_identifier_type pit on pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id join global_property gp on gp.property="bahmni.primaryIdentifierType" and gp.property_value=pit.uuid join person p on p.person_id = v.patient_id join location l on l.uuid = ${visit_location_uuid} and v.location_id = l.location_id left outer join visit_attribute va on va.visit_id = v.visit_id and va.attribute_type_id = ( select visit_attribute_type_id from visit_attribute_type where name="Admission Status" ) and va.voided = 0 where v.date_stopped is null AND v.voided = 0 and v.patient_id not in ( select distinct person_id from obs join encounter on encounter.encounter_id = obs.encounter_id join visit on encounter.visit_id = visit.visit_id where visit.date_stopped is null and obs.concept_id = (select concept_id from concept where uuid = "773d36e9-119e-452c-91ee-4ac90245e504") AND DATE(obs.date_created) = CURDATE() ) order by v.date_started asc

select distinct concat( ifnull(pn.given_name,'') ,' ', pn.family_name ) as name, pi.identifier as identifier, concat("",p.uuid) as uuid, concat("",v.uuid) as activeVisitUuid, IF(va.value_reference = "Admitted", "true", "false") as hasBeenAdmitted from visit v join person_name pn on v.patient_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 join patient_identifier pi on v.patient_id = pi.patient_id join patient_identifier_type pit on pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id join global_property gp on gp.property="bahmni.primaryIdentifierType" and gp.property_value=pit.uuid join person p on p.person_id = v.patient_id join location l on l.uuid = ${visit_location_uuid} and v.location_id = l.location_id left outer join visit_attribute va on va.visit_id = v.visit_id and va.attribute_type_id = ( select visit_attribute_type_id from visit_attribute_type where name="Admission Status" ) and va.voided = 0 where v.date_stopped is null AND v.voided = 0
AND v.patient_id IN ( select o.person_id from obs o where o.obs_id in (select obs_group_id from obs, concept_set cs where obs.concept_id = cs.concept_id AND cs.concept_set=6240) and o.concept_id=6240 AND (DATE(o.date_created) = CURDATE() OR DATE(o.date_created) IS NULL) AND o.voided = 0 -- PATIENT WITH VITALS AND HAVE OTHER OBS UNION SELECT v.patient_id from visit v where v.patient_id NOT IN (SELECT v.patient_id FROM obs o LEFT JOIN visit v ON v.patient_id = o.person_id WHERE DATE(v.date_started) = CURDATE() AND DATE(v.date_stopped) IS NULL AND (DATE(o.date_created) = CURDATE() OR DATE(o.date_created) IS NULL) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) = CURDATE() -- AND o.obs_id IS NULL AND v.voided = 0) AND DATE(v.date_started) = CURDATE() AND DATE(v.date_stopped) IS NULL -- PATIENT VISIT OPEN WTH NO OBS TODAY ) AND v.patient_id NOT IN ( SELECT o.person_id FROM obs o where o.obs_id in ( SELECT obs.obs_group_id FROM obs, concept_set cs WHERE obs.concept_id = cs.concept_id AND cs.concept_set != 6240 AND (DATE(obs.date_created) = CURDATE() OR DATE(obs.date_created) IS NULL) AND obs.voided = 0 AND obs.obs_group_id is not null) AND concept_id not in ( SELECT obs.concept_id FROM obs, concept_set cs WHERE obs.concept_id = cs.concept_id AND cs.concept_set = 6240 AND (DATE(obs.date_created) = CURDATE() OR DATE(obs.date_created) IS NULL) ) AND o.concept_id != 6240 AND (DATE(o.date_created) = CURDATE() OR DATE(o.date_created) IS NULL) AND o.voided = 0 ) order by v.date_started asc
